Posts.Content: On 7/28/2009 Milissalynn wrote: Hi my mom has metastic breast cancer that has gone to the bone. Her oncologist is wanting her to do a injection of strontium. I was wondering if anyone has had this done before. If so, What side effects did you have from this? Were you sick? that kind of stuff i would like to know. thank you. How old is your mom?  Did you take the traditional route?
Posts.Title: Mets to the bone to receive Strontium

Posts.Content: On 7/28/2009 Milissalynn wrote: Hi my mom has metastic breast cancer that has gone to the bone. Her oncologist is wanting her to do a injection of strontium. I was wondering if anyone has had this done before. If so, What side effects did you have from this? Were you sick? that kind of stuff i would like to know. thank you. I have a friend right now in Mx with 4th stage breast cancer.  Her Dr. gave up but never told her the ending diagnosis. He sent her home with no hope. A nurse found out how terminal she is.  She is in Mx and doing fabulous. Go to http://cancersupport-center.com
Posts.Title: Mets to the bone to receive Strontium
